content:
ReliableStateManager.Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.IReliableStateManager.CreateTransaction Method

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.dll

In this Article

Create and start a new transaction that can be used to group operations to be performed atomically.

Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.ITransaction IReliableStateManager.CreateTransaction ();
Returns
ITransaction

A new transaction.

Remarks

Operations are added to the transaction by passing the object in to reliable state methods.
